author: Adam Wells
title: Bears Announce $1.92M Donation Toward COVID-19 Relief Efforts
description: The  Chicago Bears  have announced a donation to help aid in coronavirus relief efforts.  On Thursday, Bears president and CEO  Ted Phillips  issued a  statement  saying the team will ...
content:
David Banks/Getty Images
The Chicago Bears have announced a donation to help aid in coronavirus relief efforts.
On Thursday, Bears president and CEO Ted Phillips issued a statement saying the team will pledge $1,920,000 that will be distributed to various o… [+1146 chars]
